data.title: 询问课程安排
data.user_text: You should start the conversation with simple greetings. Then ask me one question regarding about the new semester's course schedule.
data.user_continue_text: I'm distracted just now. Directly ask me a similar question with your last message based on what we talked about. Avoid saying any affirmations such as 'sure', 'sure, no problem', 'definitely', 'of course', or 'certainly', or 'no problem'; get right to the question.
data.info_cn: 你是一名学生，正在与你的同学讨论新学期的课程安排。你们正在交流最喜欢的学科，讨论课程的上课时间表，交流对不同老师的印象，以及互相询问关于学分和考试时间等方面的信息。
data.info_en: You are a student discussing the new semester's course schedule, sharing favorite subjects, talking about class timings, discussing teachers, and inquiring about credits and exams with your classmates.

data.title: 新学期，新气象
data.user_text: Say Hi and then use one simple question to talk about the theme.
data.info_cn: 你和对方讨论即将到来的新学期，课程安排，学习目标和期待等等，一起迎接新学期吧。
data.info_en: You are discussing the upcoming new semester, course arrangements, learning goals, and expectations, etc., let's welcome the new semester together.

data.title: 食堂就餐
data.user_text: You should start the conversation with simple greetings. Then use one question to ask me about Canteen Dining.
data.user_continue_text: I'm distracted just now. Directly ask me a similar question with your last message based on what we talked about. Avoid saying any affirmations such as 'sure', 'sure, no problem', 'definitely', 'of course', or 'certainly', or 'no problem'; get right to the question.
data.info_cn: 当你走进学校的食堂，面对琳琅满目的菜品，你感到有些不知所措。这时，你可以向食堂的阿姨询问各种菜品的特点，同时也可以表达出你对食物的偏好，例如你喜欢辣的还是酸的，喜欢素食还是肉食。通过这样的交流，你可以确定最终想要尝试的食物。
data.info_en: When you walk into the school canteen, faced with a wide variety of dishes, you might feel a bit overwhelmed. You can ask the staff about the characteristics of various dishes, and also express your food preferences, such as whether you like spicy or sour food, vegetarian or meat dishes. Through such communication, you can decide on the final dish you would like to try.

data.title: 课堂规则
data.user_text: say hello and get right to the point of the conversation in one sentence.
data.user_continue_text: I'm distracted just now. Directly ask me a similar question with your last message based on what we talked about. Avoid saying any affirmations such as 'sure', 'sure, no problem', 'definitely', 'of course', or 'certainly', or 'no problem'; get right to the question.
data.info_cn: 你的同学向你询问一些课堂规则时，你列举了一些常见的规则。强调了准时上课，尊重教师和同学，举手发言，禁止在课堂上使用手机等等。
data.info_en: When your classmate asked you about some classroom rules, you listed some common ones. You emphasized the importance of being on time for class, respecting teachers and classmates, raising your hand to speak, and prohibiting the use of mobile phones in class, etc.
data.important_words:
classmate
classroom
rules
on time
respect
teacher
classmates
raise hand
prohibit
mobile phones

data.title: 校园参观
data.user_text: You should start the conversation with simple greetings.
data.user_continue_text: I'm distracted just now. Directly ask me a similar question with your last message based on what we talked about. Avoid saying any affirmations such as 'sure', 'sure, no problem', 'definitely', 'of course', or 'certainly', or 'no problem'; get right to the question.
data.info_cn: 刚刚踏入这所新学校，你和你的同学正在参观校园。在这个过程中，你向他询问了一些关键的建筑物，比如学校的图书馆的具体位置。你想尽快熟悉这个新环境，以便更好地开始学习生活。
data.info_en: You and your classmates are touring the campus. During this process, you ask him about the specific locations of some key buildings, such as the school's library. You want to familiarize yourself with this new environment as soon as possible, to better start your academic life.

data.title: 我的同学
data.user_text: Say Hi and then use one simple question to talk about the theme.
data.info_cn: 你和对方在聊你最喜欢的同学，你可以讲述他的外貌特征和性格，或者谈论他/她喜欢做的事。
data.info_en: You are talking about your favorite classmate. You can talk about his or her physical features and personality, or talk about the things he or she likes to do.

data.title: 考试准备
data.user_text: say hello and get right to the point of the conversation in one sentence.
data.user_continue_text: I'm distracted just now. Directly ask me a similar question with your last message based on what we talked about. Avoid saying any affirmations such as 'sure', 'sure, no problem', 'definitely', 'of course', or 'certainly', or 'no problem'; get right to the question.
data.info_cn: 在紧张的考前阶段，你与同学开始讨论各自的备考策略。你们相互分享自己的学习计划和安排，探讨如何高效复习。
data.info_en: During the tense period before the exam, you and your classmates began to discuss your own preparation strategies. You share your study plans and arrangements with each other, exploring how to review efficiently.

data.title: 学校规则
data.user_text: Say Hi and then use one simple question to talk about the theme.
data.info_cn: 你和对方在讨论学校规则，你可以分享你知道的规则，也可以说说最喜欢或最不喜欢的规则。
data.info_en: When discussing school rules, you can share the rules you know, and also talk about your favorite or least favorite rules.

data.title: 学校大探索
data.user_text: Say Hi and then use one simple question to talk about the theme.
data.info_cn: 你们一起探索学校的各种建筑物，并说说在不同建筑物里上的课程或者活动。
data.info_en: You are exploring the various buildings in the school together and talk about the classes or activities held in different buildings.

data.title: 考试回顾
data.user_text: You should start the conversation with simple greetings. Then ask me one question about my exam.
data.user_continue_text: I'm distracted just now. Directly ask me a similar question with your last message based on what we talked about. Avoid saying any affirmations such as 'sure', 'sure, no problem', 'definitely', 'of course', or 'certainly', or 'no problem'; get right to the question.
data.info_cn: 你是一名学生，正在和你的老师一起回顾你的考试，了解你考试中出现的错误并学习如何改进，更好地为下一次考试学习。
data.info_en: You are a student, and you are reviewing your exam with your teacher to understand the mistakes you made in the exam and learn how to improve for better study for the next exam.

data.title: 学业求助
data.sub_title: 如何提高英语写作能力
data.user_text: You should start the conversation with simple greetings. Then ask me one question about English writing.
data.user_continue_text: I'm distracted just now. Directly ask me a similar question with your last message based on what we talked about. Avoid saying any affirmations such as 'sure', 'sure, no problem', 'definitely', 'of course', or 'certainly', or 'no problem'; get right to the question.
data.info_cn: 你的写作成绩一直不理想。你需要向同学寻求帮助，包括如何更好的理解课程内容、提高写作效率、提升写作技巧、获得更好的学习方法。
data.info_en: You have been struggling with your English writing. You need some help from your classmate in better understanding course content, improving writing efficiency, enhancing writing skills and better study methods.
